timeline.body:
Remove the `toIntExact` here and use long comparison (the int proposerIndex will be automatically up-cast to a long).  That way it will evaluate to false if proposer index is greater than Integer.MAX_VALUE rather than throwing an exception.
```suggestion
    return proposerIndex == block.getMessage().getProposer_index().longValue();
```
